snippet: As the authorities searched for two escapees from a northern New York prison, people in the area and across the nation found themselves hoping the convicts wouldn’t be caught — at least not anytime soon.
abstract: Conclusion of manhunt for escaped convicts Richard W Matt and David Sweat, who broke out of Clinton Correctional Facility in upstate New York, brings relief to members of public, though some also feel twinge of disappointment that thrilling narrative is over; weeks-long manhunt had been closely followed by many who are fascinated with stories of antiheroes and fugitives.
lead_paragraph: As the authorities searched for two escapees from a northern New York prison, people in the area and across the nation found themselves hoping the convicts wouldn’t be caught — at least not anytime soon.

headline.main: Twinges of Disappointment Amid Sighs of Relief at End of Manhunt
headline.print_headline: Twinges of Disappointment Amid Sighs of Relief at the End of a Manhunt
